word: H4911 - מָשַׁל - mâshal - maw-shal' - Be like - போன்று

sections.paragraph: வினைச்சொல் - சொல், கூறு, உரை, கவிகட்டு, ஒப்பாயிரு, போலிரு, ஒப்பிடு, ஒப்பாகு, போலாகு
(1) to represent, to liken, to be like
a) (Niphal) to liken, to be like, to be similar
(2) to speak in a proverb, to use a proverb, to speak in parables, to speak in sentences of poetry
a) (Qal) to use a proverb, to speak a parable or proverb
b) (Piel) to make a parable; maker of parables (participle)

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: Denominative from H4912; to liken, that is, (transitively) to use figurative language (an allegory, adage, song or the like); intransitively to resemble: - be (-come) like, compare, use (as a) proverb, speak (in proverbs), utter.
Cognate: H4911, H4912, H4914, H4915
